speaker: SCULLY

speaker: MULDER
line: Since 1967, over 34 states have reported unsolved cases of cattle mutilations. Trace evidence is remarkably similar. Incision marks of surgical precision. speaker: SCULLY

speaker: MULDER

speaker: SCULLY

speaker: MULDER

line: 35 AM E.S.T. It is night. There is a storm outside. Lightening and thunder. Teena is in bed. She is holding her stuffed bunny. She lifts her head off the pillow. line: We didn't do anything wrong.

speaker: CINDY
line: We're just little girls.

speaker: MULDER
line: That's the last thing you are.

speaker: MRS REARDON
line: They said they have an excellent program that can help her.

speaker: MULDER
line: They can't hide behind the bureaucracy, Mrs. Reardon. You have every right to know what happened. You have a right to know about your daughter.

speaker: MRS REARDON
line: All I need to know is she was not my daughter. She never was.

speaker: EVE 6
line: Hello girls. So nice to have company.

speaker: GUARD
line: Sign for this.

speaker: EVE 9
line: Hello Eve 8.

speaker: EVE 8
line: How did you know I'd come for you?

speaker: EVE 10
line: We've been waiting.

speaker: EVE 8
line: How did you know I'd come for you?

speaker: EVE 9
line: We just knew.

line: We just knew.
